title: Sono Apartment, Zashiki Warashi Tsuki Bukken ni Tsuki...
original_name: そのアパート、座敷童子付き物件につき・・・
sinopse:
32-year-old Ryuutaro Saeki is divorced and returns to living alone again. He is quick to find a suspicious cheap property, but in that room, he is greeted by a Zashiki Warashi. This is the beginning of a bizarre and funny life of two people living together!

(Source: Takeshobo, translated)
